title: AFL secures financial lifeline from banks as coronavirus impact hits home
description: In what it describes as a "relief", the AFL receives a line of credit with two major banks that will help the league continue operating during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Posted 
March 30, 2020 18:03:43
The AFL has secured a line of credit with two major banks that will allow the league to continue operating during the coronavirus pandemic.
Key points:
<ul><li>The total amount of the AFL loans is reportedly more than $500 … [+2354 chars]
